website_summaries.verdict: The AMD FX-8370E processor emphasizes efficiency, with low power consumption and reasonable performance.
pros: Compatible with older AMD sockets and motherboards
Has a lower TDP rating than other high-end AMD processors
cons: Not as power-efficient as competing Intel CPUs that also have on-chip graphics

customer_reviews.title: A very good compromise between processing speed and power consumption
customer_reviews.text: This CPU provides a very good compromise between processing speed and power consumption. It is fast enough to handle some serious gaming, and demanding applications such as video editors. The lower power consumption also means it generates less heat than the non "e" version, however I would recommend buying a better CPU cooler. The stock cooler works fine, but will spend a lot of time spinning at full speed, and so makes a fair bit of noise. I'm using a Zalman CNPS7X LED CPU Cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: this was the best CPU supported by the motherboard
customer_reviews.text: In order to resurrect a 5 year old system, this was the best CPU supported by the motherboard. Compared to the FX 6100 it replaced, it was a big improvement. I set all cores to turbo speed (4.3ghz) and it handles everything I use it for without issues. It will become dated (if not already) with new upcoming AMD cpu releases in March, however it is the best available AM3+ socket chip and was the cheaper option to keep it going for another year without replacing the motherboard.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected - runs in my media PC ...
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected - runs in my media PC attached to my TV in the lounge. The lower thermal load for the "e" makes it quieter (running an Arctic Cooling Freezer 7 heatsink), but fast enough for all the steam games and hooked to a GTX 750ti
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: And super cool.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for upgrade super CPU runs cool low voltage and easy to overclock if needed handles most tasks easily great value and son well pleased with itfor gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Bimbsi59

customer_reviews.title: great value & performance
customer_reviews.text: really good cpu for the price, a nice boost to my fx 6300, pretty good performance especially with multi threaded applications & games, temps stay cool too
customer_reviews.author: KC_rocka

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what i need upgraded from a FX 6300, Great Line Up of chips for a budget! Does what you need it to do
customer_reviews.author: DYLAN W

customer_reviews.title: read
customer_reviews.text: you got to overclock it to get 4.3. not as it said in the item desciption
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Rickard

customer_reviews.title: Great wee processor
customer_reviews.text: Great wee processor, the only thing holding it back for me is my old mono but the CPU is still miles better than what i had before
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great AMD processor, good balance between cost, performance and heat output and 8 cores !
customer_reviews.text: Great performance, low heat output so fans don't have to work hard at all. Easy to fit. Paired with Corsair CW-9060015-WW Hydro Series H75 120 mm High Performance All-in-One Liquid CPU Cooler (I was able to buy the H75 on Amazon for the same money as H65 on ebuyer!). Will try overclocking some time in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: really good for the price of £140. I recommend leaving it at stock clock as it runs amazing. Just waiting for zen XD. With my 2gb 960 it can max out gta v, doom, csgo - just a really good value chip.
customer_reviews.author: PeNG G innit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really Great proccesor been running for a while runs really well!
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Ruth

customer_reviews.title: FX8370E Processor.
customer_reviews.text: Good processor, keeps nice and cool until you try to overclock. But it handles everything i throw at it. For the price it's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Carl Tyler

product_meta.title: AMD FX-8370E Black Edition Hex Core CPU
product_meta.description:
The new AMD FX 8-Core Processor is now faster than ever! It’s still unlocked for your overclocking pleasure, and it’s still the only 8-core desktop processor around. AMD FX processors have broken records before and now it’s your turn. Experience unmatched multitasking and pure core performance with a new architecture and great prices.

BOX CONTAINS
CPU;Heatsink
feature_bullets: Integrated DRAM Controller with AMD Memory Optimizer Technology
